div.p: I think I’ve got a social life, my partner doesn’t... I think the only thing that really probably does affect me when I’m out
and I see parents and they want to talk to me when they can see that I’m in town shopping or I’m in a supermarket and they want
to talk about their child in the middle of the aisle but I think I’ve become more professional now in saying look this is not the right time
to be talking about this if you want to give me a ring and we can discuss it further then so that’s probably my, yeah.
My health is good now, I’ve had my issues with drugs in the past so I’ve been clean now for 14 years and I think that was always
a worry for me was knowing how my past life was when I was younger through my sort of substance misuse and stuff
but now I would like to think that I’m somebody now who’s sort of changed and moved forward so my health isn’t a problem now, touch wood.
